Considering Disney XD was aimed at kids aged 6-15, "Gravity Falls" can be really dark; not in a bad way just ... surprising.
@E_Swymer What are you going to do, right? Things are great as they are.
@E_Swymer It's pretty bleak. Attractive well-educated people everywhere who work to live, not live to work.
https://t.co/DIV3j7UkDN
@E_Swymer Under every stone and every bed. Yet ... no bread lines and supermarkets with 10 types of fabric softener.
@E_Swymer When I lived in Europe, many people worked in cafes and restaurants because it paid a liveable wage (rent/food) and wasn't looked down on.
"We can't find people to work the jobs!" "What about paying them more?" "... ... NO!" https://t.co/qhMYaHlURe
